description: Add support for listing discovered resources

Fix the issue where the command would fail to honor an existing AWS_CA_BUNDLE environment setting and end up with "SSLError: object has no attribute" (`issue 1468 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/1468>`__)
Add support for nested hashes when using shorthand syntax (`issue 1444 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/1444>`__)
